title: Working Memory Assessment Tool Development Process

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of introductory cognitive psychology concepts and familiarity with working memory principles
context.additional_context: A course focused on acquiring the design and validation process of working memory assessment tools in digital environments, with hands-on practice at each stage of the ADDIE model and team project execution.

learning_goals: Learners can design a working memory assessment tool by applying the four phases (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation) of the ADDIE model
Develop at least three working memory tasks (WM Tasks) that incorporate cultural-contextual elements
Conduct expert reviews (5+ experts) and user testing (10+ participants) to validate the content validity of animation-based assessment tools
Demonstrate the reliability of the new tool through correlation analysis with existing working memory assessment instruments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
